text: Mwasi Collective is an Afro-feminist group. It was started in France in 2014. Mwasi participates in protests and does activism among black women in France. Its political beliefs are Pan-Africanist, feminist, and anti-capitalist. Mwasi has members from the Caribbean, Africa, and Europe. ==References== Category:Feminism Category:Activism Category:Pan-Africanists
title: Mwasi Collective
